data.name: COOLEST
data.description: Standard for strong gravitational lensing studies

evidence: "This project provides tools to manipulate lens models as a single, human-readable JSON template file alongside Python routines for visualizing and comparing lens models" (Python tools intended to be imported and used in other code).

"Template file system (coolest.template): a Python interface to create, store and manipulate COOLEST template files" and "Analysis & plotting (coolest.api): a Python interface to compute key lensing quantities and generate publication-ready lens model plots" (domain-specific analysis functionality for strong lensing research).
